unnormalised: OMG, I messed up big time! I was trying to pay my credit card bill, right? And I accidentally entered my friend Aisha's IFSC code, SBIN0003269, instead of mine! Luckily, the transaction didn't go through 'cause the account number, which is 9876543210123, didn't match the IFSC code at all. Pheww! Lesson learned: double-check everything, especially when money is involved! My PAN card no. is ABCD1234E, and now I'm paranoid someone will steal my identity.
normalised: Oh my G-O-D, I messed up big time! I was trying to pay my credit card bill, right? And I accidentally entered my friend Aisha's I-F-S-C code, S-B-I-N zero zero zero three two six nine, instead of mine! Luckily, the transaction did not go through because the account number, which is nine eight seven six five four three two one zero one two three, did not match the I-F-S-C code at all. Pheww! Lesson learned: double-check everything, especially when money is involved! My P-A-N card number is A-B-C-D one two three four E, and now I am paranoid someone will steal my identity.
